mapper.select: select * from kyuyo_history order by shain_no
mapper.insert: insert into kyuyo_history (shain_no, kizoku_ym, sikyu_pay, kojyo_pay) values (#{shain_no}, #{kizoku_ym}, #{sikyu_pay}, #{kojyo_pay})
mapper.update: update kyuyo_history set kizoku_ym=#{kizoku_ym}, sikyu_pay = #{sikyu_pay}, kojyo_pay = #{kojyo_pay} where shain_no= #{shain_no} and kizoku_ym = #{kizoku_ym}
mapper.select: SELECT kizoku_YM, sum(sikyu_pay) as sumSikyuPay, sum(kojyo_pay) as sumKojyoPay, COUNT(*) as count from kyuyo_history where SUBSTR(kizoku_ym, 1, 4) = #{kizoku_ym} group by kizoku_ym order by kizoku_ym
